str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From phone; to emit a sound; by implication, to address in words or by name, also in imitation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A household servant. From oikeo; a fellow resident, i.e. Menial domestic.
Pious, God-fearing, devout. From eu and sebomai; well-reverent, i.e. Pious.
A soldier. From a presumed derivative of the same as stratia; a camper-out, i.e. A warrior.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To persist, persevere in, continue steadfast in; I wait upon.
